name: DCH Blood Spot Outcome HCU SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the outcome of the blood spot screening for homocystinuria.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Newborn blood spot specimen received
Homocystinuria screening declined
Homocystinuria screening declined, no history of being screened (situation)
Homocystinuria screening declined, screened in UK (as reported by parents) with no evidence of result
Homocystinuria screening declined, screened outside UK with evidence of result
Homocystinuria screening declined, screened outside UK with no evidence of result
Homocystinuria screening, repeat screening with further sample required
Homocystinuria screening, too young for reliable screening
Homocystinuria screening, sample taken too soon after blood transfusion (less than 72 hours)
Homocystinuria screening, insufficient sample
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): incorrect blood application
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): compressed/damaged
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: day 0 and day 5 on same card
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: NHS number missing/not accurately recorded
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: date of sample missing/not accurately recorded
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: date of birth not accurately matched
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: expired card used
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: more than 14 days in transit, too old for analysis
Homocystinuria screening, unsuitable sample: damaged in transit
Homocystinuria not suspected
Homocystinuria not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected homocystinuria
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete (finding)
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete: over 1 year old, too old for screening (finding)
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete, moved out of area (finding)
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete, not contactable, reasonable efforts made (finding)
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete, baby died (finding)
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete, not required, previous valid result (finding)
